summary: Fixes the Offline bug found in Steam.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/972816-1342523389.png[/img][/center]

Please read [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/103/]this article[/url]: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/103/
[list]
Quoting The Vampire Dante (moderator):
[quote name=\'The Vampire Dante\' timestamp=\'1340815879\' post=\'5666037\']
[color=\"#FF8C00\"]
Took a look myself, I see nothing harmful or dangerous about this file. 

Unless you can absolutely prove that this file has caused some damage without the change of anything else being the cause, I suggest you refrain from posting such.

You are supposed to use the report function anyway about such issues.[/color]
[/quote]

[*][b]Description[/b]
[/list]

[center]You decided to play Skyrim and you don\'t have network at your uncle\'s house and therefore you cannot connect to Steam and cannot activate the Offline mode? This mod fixes it.[/center]

[list]

[*][b]Installation[/b]
[/list]

[center]Please refer to the documentation in the download section.
[/center]
[list]
[b][*]Use[/b][/list]

[center]Launch the Utility to fix the Offline mode and be able to play online or offline.[/center]

[img]http://www.2time-sys.com/2TimeBlog/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/Warning2.png[/img][right] [u]This small utility is legit and will NOT allow you to play a non-legit copy of Skyrim. This is just a fix for people who cannot launch Steam when they have no network.[/u][/right]
author: Sagittarius22
